Documentation: Download Edit on Github

Download

Quill comes ready to use in several convenient forms.

CDN

A globally distributed and available CDN is provided, backed by Amazon Cloudfront.

<!-- Main Quill library -->
<script src="//cdn.quilljs.com/./quill.js"></script>
<script src="//cdn.quilljs.com/./quill.min.js"></script>

<!-- Theme included stylesheets -->
<link href="//cdn.quilljs.com/./quill.snow.css" rel="stylesheet">
<link href="//cdn.quilljs.com/./quill.bubble.css" rel="stylesheet">

<!-- Core build with no theme, formatting, non-essential modules -->
<link href="//cdn.quilljs.com/./quill.core.css" rel="stylesheet">
<script src="//cdn.quilljs.com/./quill.core.js"></script>

NPM

Add Quill as an NPM dependency and add it your own build workflow, or use the included built options. Compiled stylesheets are also included in dist/ folder.

npm install quill@.

Direct Download

Quill builds are also available for direct download on every release.

Source

And of course the complete source code is always available on Github.

git clone git@github.com:quilljs/quill.git
Quickstart Configuration

An Open Source Project

Quill is permissively licensed under BSD. Use it freely in personal or commercial projects. Join the growing community on Github!
Star 8,000
